alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Marion (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 2:05AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Marion and south central Hamilton Counties through 230 AM EDT... At 205 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Indianapolis, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Carmel and Lawrence around 225 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Indianapolis and Fishers. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 108 and 121. Interstate 69 between mile markers 200 and 204. Interstate 70 between mile markers 76 and 88. Interstate 74 between mile markers 72 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
